name: Skillet
longname: A recipe saver and cooking tracker
imageAlt: A screenshot of the skillet website
description: When I first learned to cook, I used a spreadsheet to track my recipes, the dishes I had learned, and my overall progress. This app allows others to do the same with a convenient, minimalist user interface.
technologies: Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript, SQL

name: Image To ASCII
imageAlt: A screenshot of the image to ascii website
description: Image to ascii converters are common on the internet, but many of them lack customization and use confusing, text heavy interfaces. This app aims to provide an easy and highly customizeable ascii to image conversion experience.
technologies: Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript

name: Joust MP
imageAlt: A screenshot of the joust multiplayer website
description: A multiplayer remix of the classic arcade game Joust from 1982. The server is written using flask-socketio.
technologies: Flask, Python, Socket IO, HTML, CSS, Javascript

name: Hobbit Meal Planner
imageAlt: A screenshot of the hobbit meal planner website
description: What about second breakfast? With this web app you can build your 7 meal feast using a customizeable meal plan creator.

name: MakeOverflow
imageAlt: A screenshot of the makeoverflow.com website
description: MakeOverflow is a Stack Overflow clone designed specifically for MakeSchool students.
technologies: Flask, Python, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript

name: Doughversity
imageAlt: A screenshot of the doughversity.com website
description: Doughversity is a platform to allow local bakeries to sell their goods online direct to consumers. This app is currently a prototype and is still in development. Much of the base functionality, however, is complete. Feel free to create an account and mess around. Check out my write up of the website here: rb.gy/ttlkrz

name: Anonymous Chat
imageAlt: A teal message bubble with the word no inside of it.
description: NoKnow provides fully anonymous online communication. No data is saved and usernames are random to establish complete anonymity.

name: csrichart.com
imageAlt: A screenshot of the csrichart.com website
description: CSRichArt is a portfolio website I created for the artist Cheryl Richards. Check out her work!

name: HHSEasy Cal
imageAlt: A screenshot of the hhseasycal website
description: A calendar and block schedule app I designed to help students at my highschool to better navigate an over complicated class block schedule.

name: Quarticolor
imageAlt: A red, blue, green, and yellow circle
description: Quarticolor is a fast paced color sorting game created with spritekit and swift 3. Originally published to Apple's app store in December of 2018 it is, unfortunately, no longer avaliable.

name: Lawn Mower Man Mobile
imageAlt: A man riding a lawn mower
description: Lawn mower man is an idle game where the player mows lawns to earn money. The money can then be used to upgrade their lawn mower. Lawn mower man gained a cult following during its time on Apple's app store. Unfortunately the app is no longer avaliable.

name: 3d Printing
imageAlt: A 3d printer printing an orange rocket ship
description: This project was created for a middle school technology student association (TSA) competition on website design and the history of 3d printers.
